A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a rotten movie! Hated what Rian and Kathleen did to Luke Skywalker especially after Mark Hamill objected to basically everything Rian envisioned for his character. A good writer/director would actually have respected Mr. Hamill's feedback as being the best qualified of anyone - especially since Mr. Hamill has been defined by this role since for 40 years.

 The utter lack of respect for the massive fan base is astounding - I can't believe Disney actually released this garbage. I told all my friends and family - after I read what happened between Mr. Hamill and Ryan - that "I have a bad feeling about this". The disparity between reviews from the critics at 92% and the fan base now at 54% isn't normal either\, and smacks of biased movie critics.

I could go on and on\, but frankly the movie isn't worth another moment of thought - time to move on to something better to spend my money on. I know what I WON'T be spending it on until they fire Rian and Kathleen for hiring him for 3 more movies - I wont be spending on anything Star Wars or Disney.
